snippet: A new NBC Sports Network promo for Major League Soccer.
abstract: A new NBC Sports Network promo for Major League Soccer.
lead_paragraph: Pretty interesting NBC Sports Network promo of Major League Soccer. The new network was the Versus channel until 4 p.m. Eastern, Monday. M.L.S. will make its debut on NBC with the game between the Red Bulls and Dallas from Frisco, Tex., on Sunday, March 11 at 3 p.m. Eastern.
